it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons

Class AbstractWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.AbstractWeapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlternativeModesWeapon, OptionalEffectsWeapon

    public abstract class AbstractWeapon
extends Object
    The controller for using a weapon.

    A weapon is made up of effects that can be used in different orders depending on the implementation.

    AbstractWeapon provides methods to add controllers for effects, which are stored in a Map.

    It also provides methods to save Players and Squares. These can be saved/accessed by the users of the weapon as a temporary state.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

                      Match match,
                      ControllerFactory factory)
        Creates a new weapon controller, with no effects.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - The weapon card associated to this weapon, not null
        match - The match which has to be controlled, not null
        factory - The factory needed to create other controllers, not null

        public void savePlayer(String id,
                       Player player)

        player - The player to be saved, not null

        public void selectCardinalDirection(CardinalDirection direction)

        Parameters:

      • getEffects

        public Map<String,AbstractEffect> getEffects()
        Returns the effects of this weapon.
        Returns:
        A map where the key is the effect id and the value is the effect

      • addEffect

        public void addEffect(AbstractEffect effect)
        Adds given effect to this weapon, if an effect with the same id is already present, the given effect is not added. If the given effect cannot be added because of restrictions, the implementation should throw IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        effect - The effect to be added, not null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the effect cannot be added due to restrictions

      • use

        public abstract void use(PersistentView view)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Makes the user with given view use this weapon in the current state of the match
        Parameters:
        view - The view of the player who wants to use this weapon, not null
        Throws:
        CancellationException - if a request to the user gets cancelled
        InterruptedException - if the thread gets interrupted
